name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of robust experience in designing scalable applications leveraging **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, **Confluent Kafka**, and **KStreams**. Proficient in **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Azure DevOps**, I ensure agile delivery and continuous integration for high-performance solutions. My solid background in building microservices and event-driven architectures enhances system efficiency and reliability. 
Additionally, I excel in using **React**, **TypeScript**, and **JavaScript** to develop responsive and dynamic user interfaces, complemented by **Material-UI** and **Redux**. Skilled in operational practices and efficient project management with tools like **Jira** and **Confluence**, I effectively communicate across teams to align development efforts. 
With a commitment to implementing secure applications, I adhere to compliance standards while utilizing agile methodologies to drive innovation in software development.
